DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Parallel-Group , 24-Week , Chronic-Dosing , Multi-Center Study Assess Efficacy Safety PT010 , PT003 , PT009 Compared With Symbicort® Turbuhaler® ( Kronos )
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Parallel-Group , 24-Week , Chronic-Dosing , Multi-Center Study Assess Efficacy Safety PT010 , PT003 , PT009 Compared With Symbicort® Turbuhaler® Active Control Subjects Moderate Very Severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease This study include follow 3 sub-studies : 12-hour Pulmonary Function Test ( PFT ) , Pharmacokinetic ( PK ) Profile , Hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal Axis .
